resources.string: Please enter in the currency types and numbers
This Currency Converter app was created by Elky Halberstam, for her Final Project in the Android App Development Course (MCON 255) during the Summer Semester of 2022

This app converts an amount from the currency of your choice to another currency of your choice. Just input the currencies, the amount of money and the exchange rate (in decimal format) then click the button to calculate.
